徎字的基本解释

徎
chěng
古同“逞”，疾行。

徎
zhèng
小路。

徎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chěng］
［《集韻》丑郢切，上静，徹。］
亦作“侱2”。同“逞1”。
任性而行，径行。
[②]［zhèng］
［《廣韻》丈井切，上静，澄。］
小路。

徎字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【彳字部】　徎； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页367第06
【唐韻】【集韻】?丑郢切，音騁。【說文】徑行也。　又【廣韻】丈井切，音?。雨後徑也。　又【集韻】里郢切，音領。義同。　又他頂切，音珽。徑也。

徎字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
徎字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Linger
chěng
Gu Tong "fought" and moved quickly.
Linger
zhèng
Trail.
Linger
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［chěng］
["Jiyun" is ugly and cut, quiet and thorough. ]
Also known as "侱2". Same as "Achieve 1".
Act capriciously, just do it.
[②]［zhèng］
["Guangyun" Zhang Jing cut, quiet, clear. ]
Trail.
Linger
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 2] [彳字部] 　徎; Kangxi strokes: 10; page number: page 367 06
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Ugly cut, sound. [Said the text] Just do it.　[Guang Yun] Zhang Jing cut, sound?. After the rain, the trail is also.　[Jiyun] Inner cut, tone collar. The same meaning.　He cut again, Yinjue. Path also.
